titleStmt.title: A pastoral poem upon the discovery of a late horrid conspiracy against the sacred person of William III. King of England By the honourable E. Howard, of Suffolk.
titleStmt.author: Suffolk, Edward Howard, Earl of, 1672-1731.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Baldwin near the Oxford-Arms in Warwick-Lane,

notesStmt.note: With advertisements on the verso of the title page and at the foot of p. 12.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
